author: Namra Sayoj
comment: I just downloaded this app and tried it immediately. I like how simple and easy it is to use. But I think it needs a lot of improvement in the future update. Let me name some!  *muting option. *the video clip is limited eventhough I have trimmed all of my clips. *when you select a music, it does nothing. *option to insert your own music. *option to apply different filter from diferrent clip (this one is objective because I wasn't able to watch my final video. But I just noticed that if you select a filter from a clip, the same filter applies to the next clip even if you already selected a filter for it.  Guys, this is an amazing app. Only if you could provide those that I have mentioned. I would love to give this a 5 star rating soon.

reply.author: Pixology Ltd
reply.content: Hi Arman, thanks for the valuable feedback, we really appreciate it. Glad you loved the app overall, there are developments coming so do watch out for future updates! With regards to selecting music, did you press the tick in the corner once you had selected your track? If you press the back button it will not add the track. Thanks!

comment: Haven't been able to use it for my purpose. I have a Gopro and used the Time Lapse feature to film while painting a large mural. I have moved all the photos into my Samsung TabS2 Gallery. After tap "+" then "Gallery" nothing shows. I know the pics are there, other editing apps can find them fine. I double checked permissions and Antix has full permissions. Couldn't find troubleshoot anywhere. Maybe someone here has had similar issue and knows fix. Thanks

reply.author: Pixology Ltd
reply.content: Hello, thanks for your feedback. Antix only supports videos so if you're using photos for your timelapse unfortunately you won't be able to import them into the app. Hope that helps!

author: Naruto Uchiha
comment: THIS IS THE BEST VIDEO EDITING APP IN PLAY STORE !!! THIS APP IS DAMN AWESOME REALLY DEVELOPER!! I RESPECT YOUR AWESOME WORK !! THIS IS SO VERY EASY TO USE AND THAT'S WHY I DON'T HAVE TO USE MY PC!! THANK YOU SO MUCH FOR SUCH AN AMAZING APP !!!

reply.author: Pixology Ltd
reply.content: Wow thanks for the great review Naruto, we're stoked to hear this!

comment: App appears perfect at first but I cant split my long videos into multiple short ones. I can only edit 1 highlight per video.

reply.author: Pixology Ltd
reply.content:
Hello, you can do this in the app!  If you hold down on the clip you want to split, it will give you an option to 'copy' the clip. Press copy and then trim it using the handles. You can do this multiple times to create multiple short ones. 

You can also add in multiple highlights if you press the + button.

I hope that helps!

author: Kaylee Fantozzi
comment: It was cool as ever at first but now I don't now how to export my project  . it would be amazing if you guys. Would reply to this.

reply.author: Pixology Ltd
reply.content: Thanks Kaylee!  When you have finished editing, press the tick button in the top right corner, add a title and then press the tick again. After processing the video be stored in your gallery. Drop us an email at team@antixapp.com if you need further help. Thanks!
